meanings.definition: A record of the pedigree of purebred animals, especially horses.
meanings.sent1: The rancher consulted the studbook to trace the lineage of his prized stallion.
meanings.sent2: The studbook listed all the champion horses and their ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The studbook revealed that the horse was actually descended from a famous racehorse.
meanings.sent4: In the world of purebred horses, the studbook is like a treasure map of bloodlines.
meanings.sent5: The studbook was filled with stories of legendary horses and their feats.

meanings.definition: A book containing a list of registered stallions and their offspring.
meanings.sent1: The stable owner kept the studbook updated with the latest stallion registrations.
meanings.sent2: Every breeder eagerly awaited the new edition of the studbook.
meanings.sent3: The studbook was so thick with entries that it needed its own shelf.
meanings.sent4: To breed the best horses, one must study the studbook like a scholar.
meanings.sent5: The studbook was a treasure trove of information for horse enthusiasts.

meanings.sent1: The farmer consulted the studbook to find a suitable mate for his cow.
meanings.sent2: The studbook was essential for maintaining the quality of the livestock.
meanings.sent3: The studbook was so well-organized that even the animals could have read it.
meanings.sent4: In the world of animal breeding, the studbook is like a bible.
meanings.sent5: The studbook contained the secrets to successful animal pairings.
